column5: so the other day, the place i work at goes bankrupt.  nothing else to do but go fishing. was rewarded with a fresh run of browns & coho's      if anybody has any leads on companies looking for materials/purchasing managers, i would appreciate the heads up. Over 16 years, i have managed to generate $15,500,000 in savings for 4 companies, and i guess i need a new challenge  tightlnes
nice bunch of fish,sorry to hear about your job and hope it works out for you
Nice batch of fish and on the next job get a contract for 10% of the cost reductions. You could be fishing for ever.... if you had of done just that with the previous employers!
Must be Automotive I can relate its slow eveywhere right now You can thank the at par dollar!!!
